Firstly, I don't watch Fox, but I'll bet they didn't report this either: ^ That's the FBI being """"not on the same page"""" as the CIA regarding the """"Russian hacking"""". ^ That's John Podesta saying that something is """"deeply broken"""" at the FBI, and that it """"needs to be fixed"""". Since when can the CAMPAIGN MANAGER of a presidential candidate """"correct"""" a national law enforcement organization in an area in which he has NO expertise (hacking), and in a way that's IN THE INTERESTS OF HIS CANDIDATE, and it's not a scandal, or in most cases not even reported? Since the mainstream media turned into a bunch of presstitutes whose agenda is to be fully supportive of the same types of """"deep state"""" (look it up... I'm not here to explain everything to you) people they claim to not support, that's since when. Now you may go back to pretending you know something/have a lot to say.

When my dad retired active duty Air Force in the mid 1960s , we briefly lived in Ballast Point when the fighter wing at MacDill was flying F-4 Phantoms. (Must have been when the Spook put a spell on me , always loved the Phantom) 5 or 6 am just about every morning , those J-79s would be roaring into the sky right over the house. Kinda' annoying but being used to jet noise. Loved it. I miss the days when the F-16 wing was always flying overhead. Still look up to the sound of the KC-135s.
